title: Yarrow Natural Medicine
description: Naturopathic Medicine and Acupuncture in Madison, WI. Dr. Orit Vardi Tragash, Naturopathic Doctor and Acupuncturist gets to the root cause of your health concerns and offers safe and natural treatments to support adults and children.
cleaned_text: Using the Healing power of Nature to help you Thrive Naturopathic Medicine, Acupuncture, and Somatic Experiencing® [Dr. Orit Vardi Tragash](/orit-vardi-tragash) is a Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine, licensed Acupuncturist, and Somatic Experiencing® Practitioner. She grew up in Madison, WI and is excited to be back in her hometown to share these powerful forms of medicine with the Madison community. [Read More](/orit-vardi-tragash) [Naturopathic Medicine](/naturopathic-medicine) combines time-tested natural therapies with modern science to enhance patients' overall well-being and to prevent and support acute and chronic conditions. . [Read More](/naturopathic-medicine) [Acupuncture ](/acupuncture)is one of the oldest forms of medicine, originating in China over 5,000 years ago. It has been used to support almost every condition - including pain, fatigue, and chronic disease. At Yarrow Natural Medicine, we use a combination of Chinese acupuncture techniques along with the more gentle Japanese techniques.
